programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet Özakinb narrowly survives a bomb blast in a café thanks to the intervention of his colleague Mustafa. With two key figures in the current case dead from the blast, and the official narrative not adding up, Mehmet suspects foul play.

programme.title: A Dose Of Happiness
programme.desc: Vesala’s search for happiness led her into an early marriage and a 3-year-old daughter. After her marriage fails, she and her daughter are brought down a path that leads to hell and back, one which brings her through drugs, fall, fear and redemption.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parent’s house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the “Karnaval” brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: A Summer in the Vltava
programme.desc: After initially turning down an assignment to investigate whether a child is taken care of by her father, as children are not really her thing, Sophie reconsiders it when she needs an escape after her boyfriend suggests starting a family.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: Staring into the Abyss
programme.desc: LKA officer David Wallat monitors released child murderer Joseph Maria Hagenow, now housed by a village pastor. As Hagenow manipulates his guards, a child’s disappearance threatens to unravel Wallat’s entire operation.

programme.title: El Alamein – The Line of Fire
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of searing daytime heat and chilling nighttime cold, three-time Italian Academy Awards winner Enzo Monteleone paints a gritty, powerful WW II epic of the Italian army’s battle with the Germans to drive Allied Forces from North Africa.

programme.title: Love In Mauritius
programme.desc: 44 year-old Doria finds out her husband is cheating on her, her daughter despises her, and her job bores her. She travels to Mauritius on her mother’s invitation, and meets Theo, a man twenty years younger than her, and one who will change her life.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 2
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet Özakinb narrowly survives a bomb blast in a café thanks to the intervention of his colleague Mustafa. With two key figures in the current case dead from the blast, and the official narrative not adding up, Mehmet suspects foul play.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 3: Find Her
programme.desc: As Shelly attempts to maintain her routine, she is haunted by her past. When Lynch's true identity is discovered, a UK cold case officer re-opens a case which she is convinced involves Lynch and his then girlfriend.

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.

programme.title: Such Is Life
programme.desc: A genre bending story consisting of dark comedy, tragic comedy and drama that focuses on themes of life and death, young and old, authority, ethics and values. Jonathan, a young undertaker gets schooled in his new job by Dennis, a veteran mortician.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.

programme.title: Forever-Forever
programme.desc: In late 90s Kyiv, rebellious Tonia joins a gang, seeking protection and belonging. Amidst the ruins of the post-soviet city, she finds herself tangled up in a secret love triangle and confronting her abusive past.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence - Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2 - Abandoned Oil Wells
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes on a cross-country road trip to help the Well Done Foundation. They work to find and cap some of the estimated two million leaking, toxic - potentially deadly abandoned oil and gas wells that are scattered throughout the U.S.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2 - Snowbird Ski Resort
programme.desc: Mike Davidson embeds with the team of one of the most extreme, avalanche-prone mountain ski mountains in the world - Snowbird. They battle to keep the steep and deep slopes safe with shovels, snowcats and even a WWII Howitzer cannon.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2 - Legend Of The Warrior Queen
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota hunt for Britain’s great warrior Queen: Boudica. Mary-Ann predicts the future with a giant rabbit, while Clive rides a war chariot and peers into some entrails to discover that overthrowing the Romans was truly revolting.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2 - Leeches, Plagues And Potions
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota test outrageous remedies like leeches, head-drilling, and a pigeon that cures the plague. Also, Henry VIII’s role in Tudor medicine.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2 - The Sand Bodies Of Sutton Hoo
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota investigate one of Britain’s sinister mysteries: decapitated bodies in gruesome poses, warrior kings with tiny heads… and killer cake.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Shandong
programme.desc: On his journey discovering China's history through its food, Adam arrives in Shandong - birthplace of Confucius and one of the oldest and most influential culinary traditions in China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Yunnan
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Sichuan And Hunan
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives to the fiery provinces of Sichuan and Hunan and this time he's joined by celebrated chef and author Fuchsia Dunlop who is an expert on the region.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China - Fujian
programme.desc: Adam Liaw is in Fujian - a place with a long history of migration where the movement of people left an enduring mark that manifested in its food and culture.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP5
programme.desc: The Statue Liberty has welcomed millions of immigrants from all over the world to New York, creating a melting pot of different cultures. We visit the big apple’s vibrant neighborhoods to sample a variety of foods this great big city has to offer.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP6
programme.desc: For many years now, Los Angeles has been on a health kick, making it relatively easy for people to live a healthier lifestyle. In this episode, we’re taking a closer look at this healthy culture and seeing what the Hollywood life tastes like.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP7
programme.desc: After the Vietnam War ended in 1975, many Vietnamese people settled down in San Francisco. In this episode we meet several Vietnamese immigrants, learn about their journey to America and tastes their amazing authentic Vietnamese food.

programme.title: United Plates Of America - EP8
programme.desc: No other cuisine has had such an impact on modern dishes then Italians. Italians arrived here in droves and got straight to work. They are now loved by all, but it wasn’t always that way.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel - India, From Mumbai To Kolkata
programme.desc: Manu is in India for the first time in his life and wants to discover as much food as he can handle. From an Idli making lesson to a workout in the flower markets of Kolkata. Will he make it to Hong Kong on time and in one piece?

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel - Hong Kong
programme.desc: Manu heads to Hong Kong, the fourth country on his around the world tour, and he has some great food excursions lined up. Chicken feet, Tim Ho Wan, street food and lots to fit in before he jumps across the pond to Tokyo, Japan.

programme.title: Staring into the Abyss
programme.desc: LKA officer David Wallat monitors released child murderer Joseph Maria Hagenow, now housed by a village pastor. As Hagenow manipulates his guards, a child’s disappearance threatens to unravel Wallat’s entire operation.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?

programme.title: Love In Mauritius
programme.desc: 44 year-old Doria finds out her husband is cheating on her, her daughter despises her, and her job bores her. She travels to Mauritius on her mother’s invitation, and meets Theo, a man twenty years younger than her, and one who will change her life.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: Forever-Forever
programme.desc: In late 90s Kyiv, rebellious Tonia joins a gang, seeking protection and belonging. Amidst the ruins of the post-soviet city, she finds herself tangled up in a secret love triangle and confronting her abusive past.

programme.title: Passed by Censor
programme.desc: In an Istanbul prison, Zakir is tasked with reading and censoring the letters inmates receive. Tasked with a writing assignment for his night class, Zakir uses a photograph of an inmate's wife for inspiration, but fantasy soon morphs into delusion.

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 4: Deirdre
programme.desc: Shelly's attempts to bond with Derek are not a success. Meanwhile, following the lead of the hotel sex-worker, Jason and Fiona discover victims of a brutal trafficking organisation.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: Identifying Features
programme.desc: Magdalena, a mother in search of her missing son, meets Miguel, recently deported from the US and looking for his mother. Together, they make their way through the desolate and unforgiving militia-ridden landscapes south of the border.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: Just Like A Woman
programme.desc: Two women travel from Chicago to Santa Fe to escape their suffocating lives. Marilyn dreams of winning a contest held by a famous belly dancing company, while her friend, Mona, has a darker secret.

programme.title: Copy Cat
programme.desc: A rookie and veteran detective work together on the case of a murdered young journalist. They quickly arrest a prime suspect who seems all but surely the killer. Yet, the ease of everything unsettles them – something isn’t right but what exactly?

programme.title: The Broken Glass Theory
programme.desc: Insurance claims investigator Claudio finds himself in a never-ending nightmare in a small town. For what seemed like a simple job, Claudio's task now involves racing against the clock to discover the identity of the worst serial arsonist he has yet seen.

programme.title: GOLD 905 LIVE! with Mike & Vernetta - 22nd November 2024
programme.desc: If you want a morning show that's all-out, vigorously, eye-popping fun and jollification to wake up you with a resounding thwack in the head, then make sure you tune in to LIVE! with Mike & Vernetta! The only morning show with comedic skits, improv games, interactive games with You and journeys into a radio, TV and movie realm you've never experienced before! Join us for a different theme every day, with something for everyone!
